```py
>>> idx = pd.PeriodIndex(['2023', '2024', '2025'], freq='Y')
>>> s1 = pd.Series([1, 2, 3], index=idx)
>>> s1
2023    1
2024    2
2025    3
Freq: Y-DEC, dtype: int64 
```

```py
>>> s2 = pd.Series([1, 2, 3], index=idx)
>>> s2 = s2.to_timestamp(freq='M')
>>> s2
2023-01-31    1
2024-01-31    2
2025-01-31    3
Freq: YE-JAN, dtype: int64 
```
